title: Genexa Organic Cold Crush Cough Cold Chewable Tablets Organic Acai Berry

cleaned_text: Organic Cold Crush Cough Cold Chewable Tablets Organic Acai Berry60.0ea Online and store prices may vary. Powered by Additional perks How would you like to receive this item ? Wellness in a snap1 Description - Safe and non-drowsy: Our organic cough medicine & cold medicine is non-drowsy with no known drug interactions. - Physician-formulated: Cold Crush's safe, organic formula was created by our Chief Formulating Officer, a medical doctor and homeopathic physician. - Ingredients you deserve: No artificial sweeteners or preservatives, artificial dyes, parabens, common allergens, or artificial flavors. Certified vegan, gluten-free, organic, lactose free, & non-GMO. - Easy to use: Made with acai berry flavor, our tasty tablets are convenient for at-home or on-the-go use. Made in United States Adults and children 12 years of age and older - chew 2 tablets at the onset of symptoms - do not swallow whole - repeat every 4-6 hours as needed Children 4-11 years of age - chew 1 tablet at the onset of symptoms - do not swallow whole - repeat every 4-6 hours as needed Children under 4 years of age ask a doctor before use © Genexa (Sneezing and stuffy nose), Pulsatilla 6X HPUS loss of smell HPUS % (Restless and dry throat)Inactive Ingredients: Organic Acai Berry Flavor, Organic Carnauba Wax, Organic Dextrose, Organic Maltodextrin, Organic Rice Bran Extract Nutrition FactsServing Size 1 tabletServings Per Container 60 Nutritional Information % Daily Value Warnings - Ask a doctor before use in children under 4 years of age. - Stop use and ask a doctor if symptoms persist for more than 3 days or worsen. - If pregnant or breast-feeding, ask a doctor before use. - Keep out of reach of children.
